title: List of fatal dog attacks in the United States
data: Labrador Retriever mixes or mixed-breed dogs ( 7 )

Dianne was found dead by a neighbor after being attacked by a pack of seven dogs in her backyard . The dogs were described as large mixed-breed dogs or mutt-lab-mixed dogs by sheriffs department investigators . The dogs belonged to a neighbor that lived nearby . All of the dogs involved were euthanized

Bergman was attacked and killed by four pit bulls owned by Stephanie Johnston and Daniel Nelson , a couple who parked their converted school bus in her yard . Bergman had been trying to get the family to leave for weeks , sparked by the couple 's pit bulls attacking Bergman 's dog , a Lab . Bergman had left voice messages with her brother that she was going to insist that they leave on the same night that she was mauled to death . In late March 2019 , prosecutors announced they would not file charges against the dogs ' owner , who want their dogs returned to them . Following a hearing the owners failed to appear at , all four dogs were humanely euthanized
Mauled in his driveway , victim was aided by a neighbor with a rubber stick to ward off the two dogs . He died two weeks later . The dogs were seized

The infant girl was reportedly killed by the family dog while the mother slept . The mother was arrested for child abuse as she was intoxicated when the baby was attacked but she was later released as the investigation is still on-going . While the manner of death is still being investigated , the autopsy report describes injuries consistent with a dog attack . A photo of the dog was released and the autopsy report posted online . The dog was euthanized
Victim was mauled by the grandparent 's family dog while playing with a ball on the floor . The grandmother tried to intervene and was also bitten . The dog was euthanized

The victim trained dogs for a living ( specifically Dobermans ) and was found dead in her backyard by police with multiple bite wounds on her face and body . The Houston police found her while conducting a welfare check because she had not appeared for her dog training classes in two days . Her two adult dogs were confiscated by authorities and are being held by Houston Animal Control pending the outcome of the criminal investigation

Victim was hanging laundry in her yard when the dogs attacked . She was on life support for almost two months and died without regaining consciousness . The dogs ' owner was arrested on outstanding felony warrants and the dogs were euthanized
Victim suffered severe injuries after being attacked while out walking . She died of her injuries three days later

Neighbors attempted to stop a mauling of the victim by her own two dogs . According to a witness , the dogs had already amputated one arm and almost fully amputated the other . The dogs were seized by Animal Control

Elderly victim died from an attack by a pack of dogs that belonged to a neighbor as she was trying to clear a clogged drainage ditch in her backyard . Her sister witnessed part of the attack and was chased . Victim was flown to Vanderbilt Medical Center but passed away . The dogs were all euthanized and the District Attorney is considering criminal charges to the owner . Variously reported as German Shepherds and/or pit bulls , both breeds were eventually ruled out . The veterinarian report declared them as mixed breed ( mutt ) , and while one could have had some type of shepherd mix , none of them had pit bull features

Victim was attacked in her backyard by 6 pit bulls belonging to neighbor Courtney White . The pit bulls were euthanized and sent for rabies testing , per Texas law on fatal dog attacks . Investigation revealed that the pit bulls had a history of running loose and attacking - they had mauled a man and killed a dog only days prior to the fatal attack . After that earlier attack , White had attempted to surrender the animals to the Lubbock Animal Services ; records show he called the agency and was told the earliest surrender appointment was March 1 . White was arrested March 8 , 2019 and charged with Attack by Dog , a second-degree felony

The babysitter put down the baby boy in the living room to go outside to prepare her vehicle for transporting the infant . She heard her mother scream , ran back inside , and the baby was being mauled by her dog . The dog was seized
American Staffordshire Terrier mix ( 1 ) and American Bulldog mix ( 1 )

Victim and his grandmother went to another family member 's house to let out the dogs , which she did daily . Two of the dogs were in the backyard and attacked the child , who was killed . The grandmother tried to intervene and she was also injured . The two dogs involved were surrendered to Animal Services for quarantine and euthanizing , and the other four dogs in the household were seized , to be held until completion of the investigation

Man was attacked by three dogs owned by a relative and died on the way to the hospital . The dogs were confiscated and will likely be euthanized . Earlier the dogs ' breeds were said to be cattle dog mixes but a newer article mentions all of the dogs were of mixed breed , including a Heeler and Mastiff mix

Jaysiah was attacked in his own front yard by two loose Rottweilers . The dogs had escaped their unnamed owner 's yard by digging under the fence , something neighbors say was a common event . The victim 's grandmother suffered injuries trying to stop the dogs ; the grandfather was able to stop the attack . The dogs were seized , the owner located , and the dogs were surrendered for euthanasia

Victim was attacked and killed by her own pit bulls , 1yo male Oliver and 1yo female Delfina , as she walked them outside the vet hospital where they were being held for a rabies quarantine ( having previously gotten loose from Villafane 's property and attacked a man ) . Both pit bulls were involved in the attack , and both were so aggressive that vet staff , EMTs and police were unable to aid the victim until police shot and killed them

The 15 month old girl was attacked by a family friend 's dog and later died of her injuries at the hospital . The family was at home when the incident occurred but does n't know what happened or what caused the dog to attack the toddler . The dog has been euthanized at the family 's request

The 3 year old boy was attacked by his grandfather 's dog and later died of his injuries at the hospital . The dog had bitten the child 's ear a few weeks before the attack and neighbors reported that there have been previous problems with the dog . The dog has been quarantined and the investigation is still ongoing

Volunteer at the shelter was found dead in the exercise yard with a dog . She died of blood loss from a dog mauling . The dog , owned by Humane Society of St. Lucie County for the last 8 days , was scheduled to be euthanized 5/10/2019

The boy was at the property of dog trainer Scott Dunmore to take care of his dogs while he was out of town . The boy did n't return home within a reasonable time , so his grandmother called a neighbor , who found the boy mortally wounded and four dogs loose in the area . Four dogs were seized ( one Dutch Shepherd and three Belgian Malinois ) , along with seven other dogs which were caged at the time of the incident . The owner was out of town at the time . Investigators eventually returned most of the dogs , but euthanized five that were involved in the incident
